short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Convert your curtin timetable into a calendar file with the click of a button🚀. Save your precious time⏰

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Meet Curtin Calendar – the Chrome extension transforming your eStudent Timetable into an ICS calendar file, complete with room details and Google Map location links! 🗓️✨

🌐 Automatic Conversion: Skip the manual work – Curtin Calendar reads your eStudent timetable and generates an ICS file in a snap.

⏰ Efficient Scheduling with Ease: Curtin Calendar eliminates tedious data entry. It also respects semester dates for precise scheduling. 📆✨

📂 File Ready: Instantly download your timetable as an ICS file, compatible with all major calendar apps.

📍 Location Ready: Get room details and Google Map location links for each class – never get lost on campus again!

🚀 Chrome Extension Ease: A user-friendly extension for Chrome, integrating smoothly into your browser.

🌐 Open Source: Curtin Calendar is open source, empowering you to contribute and enhance its functionality. Plus, no data is collected, ensuring your privacy is a top priority. 🚀🔒

Upgrade your scheduling game with Curtin Calendar! Download the Chrome extension now and let technology work for you. 🚀🎓

Feel free to contribute here 
https://github.com/SetroZ/curtincalendar
